//location enable strings Discovery Add Tutorials No speaker found Make sure all of your speakers are connected to the same Wi-Fi and refresh Refresh Using the speaker for the first time? Setup New Speaker Speaker Setup Setup Instructions 1 Power on Libre speaker Go to Wi-Fi settings and select \'RIVAACONCERT_xxxxxx\'/\'RIVAASTADIUM_xxxxxx\' from the Wi-Fi list 2 3 After connecting to the Libre speaker, return to the LibreVoice app & click next Wi-Fi Settings Speaker Name Connect speaker to Wi-Fi network Select a Wi-Fi Wi-Fi Password Hmmm… We are not able to make sure whether the speaker setup has completed. If the speaker light is white. Make sure your phone is connected to the same Wi-Fi network* If the speaker light is blinking white. You might have entered incorrect Wi-Fi password* If the speaker light is blinking colors. The updating is still going on, please wait a few minutes. *You can start the setup again by resetting your speaker. OK, I got it To enable voice commands & Amazon services, please login with Amazon account. Sign in with Amazon I will sign in later Your speaker has been set up successfully. Congrats! No Wi-Fi results available Amazon Login Login with Amazon Your speaker includes access to Alexa. Connect your Amazon account to access personalized features. Alexa allows you to use your voice to play music and get news, sorts scores, weather and more- all hands-free. All you have to do is ask Alexa. amazon alexa Password cannot be empty Invalid Wi-Fi password Enter speaker name Configuring Speaker… Setting up speaker & looking for update Connected Speakers Speaker is ready for commands Logout LibreVoice Login to enable voice commands Speaker is ready for commands Speaker is ready to use Listening … You need to login to Amazon to enable speech commands https://rivaaudio.com/alexa-tutorial/en/index.html SDK Version 1.0(1.0)

Indicating light will breath in blue and turn white at the end … Updating your speaker Firmware Update in progress... You will see flashing red, blue and green lights … Your device is currently being upgraded which may take upto 5 minutes Open Wi-Fi settings Searching the renderer… Displays a notification which tells service is running to discover DMR devices riva_foreground_channel Bluetooth We will make use of Bluetooth to ease your device setup Please turn bluetooth on Other Option Bluetooth Getting Scan Results Connecting

Look for the Cast button in hundreds of apps To setup voice control from a Google Assistant-enabled speaker and multiroom groups with Chromecast-enabled speakers, download the Google Home app Open Home app Speaker" " " "has been successfully setup. Optionally, You can set up the below features now, or Skip to home. If you wish to setup later, you can find it in speaker settings.
